body: is this question still valid? do you still need explanations?
@dmarkov please pay for this and let's fix it
this task will get someone's attention soon
@lthuangiang could you please pick this up? This [article](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) explains how we work. Any technical questions you may ask right here

@lthuangiang **30 mins** is the budget of the task. This is exactly how much will be paid when the problem is solved (no matter how much time you will actually spend). See [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) for more information

> @dmarkov please pay for this and let's fix it

@yegor256 yep, done. @longtimeago 15 mins was added to your account (payment `38270145`), many thanks for your contribution!
